description:
It's a JavaScript Pivot table library for building powerful pivot grids that will help you to work with complex data. By using dhtmlxPivot, you'll be able to summarize large datasets and visualize them in a convenient way. 

Main features:


intuitive drag-n-drop interface
high performance
easy configuration and customization of layout
simple localization to any language you need
data loading in the JSON format
name: dhtmlxPivot
